name: armadillo
label: Armadillo
definition: Armadillo is a data portal that allows data stewards to share datasets on a server, and researchers to analyse these data and those shared on other servers using the DataSHIELD analysis tools.

name: opal
label: Opal
definition: Opal is OBiBa's core data managment application. This server application provides all the necessary tools to import, transform and describe data.
